3: Aboard the aircraft leaving the giant tower, Sagawa and the elder are both quiet.
As the Corrupted swarm and topple the white giant tower, they take one last look back.
Rest assured. Wuming City has agreed to take you in.
Babylonia will send supplies your way later.
...So we're going to live under other people's roofs now, huh?
Is that what's been bothering you?
Living in someone else's home means losing control over your own life.
That's what I said to you when I kicked you out of my house.
But sir, now that we're homeless, we shouldn't be dwelling on whose house we should live in.
We should be glad we have a roof over our heads at all. As long as we stay alive, there's always hope, right?
